name: TEmporal expressions IDentifier
short_description:
TEid is a rule-based temporal expressions identification software; designed for clinical data. This software was used and evaluated as part of the i2b2/2012 Temporal Relation challenge; providing state-of-the-art performance. This software provides various features for easy integration into existing pipelines (e.g., server mode, etc.); see browse code / README file. 

Related publication:
Kovačević A, Dehghan A, Filannino M, Keane JA, Nenadic, G: Combining rules and machine-learning for extraction of temporal expressions and events from clinical narratives. Journal of the American Medical Informatics Association. (submitted)
